survey_name: Employee Satisfaction with Hybrid Work Policies Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from employees regarding their satisfaction and challenges with the company's hybrid work policies, to help improve work arrangements and employee well-being.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the current hybrid work policy (e.g., days in-office vs. remote)?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for measurable satisfaction levels. Ensure mobile-friendly layout.
